  4 
  5 /**
  6  * Display current memory usage + garbage collection occurence
  7  * 
  8  * heavily based on @mrdoob stats.js
  9  */
 10 var GcMonitorStatsCollection = function (){
 11 	var container	= document.createElement( 'div' );
 12 	container.style.cssText = 'width:80px;opacity:0.9;cursor:pointer';
 13 
 14 	var divEl	= document.createElement( 'div' );
 15 	divEl.style.cssText = 'padding:0 0 3px 3px;text-align:left;background-color:#020;';
 16 	container.appendChild( divEl );
 17 
 18 	var testEl	= document.createElement( 'div' );
 19 	testEl.style.cssText = 'color:#0f0;font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:9px;font-weight:bold;line-height:15px';
 20 	testEl.innerHTML= 'Mem';
 21 	divEl.appendChild( testEl );
 22 
 23 	var graphEl	= document.createElement( 'div' );
 24 	graphEl.style.cssText = 'position:relative;width:74px;height:30px;background-color:#0f0';
 25 	divEl.appendChild( graphEl );
 26 
 27 	var currentValues	= [];
 28 	var maxViewableValue	= 2*1024*1024;
 29 	for(var i = 0; i < 74; i++){
 30 		currentValues[i]	= 0;
 31 		var barEl	= document.createElement( 'span' );
 32 		barEl.style.cssText	= 'width:1px;height:30px;float:left;background-color:#131';
 33 		graphEl.appendChild( barEl );
 34 	}
 35 
 36 	// get max of currentValues - used for autoscaling
 37 	var cpuMaxCurrentValues	= function(){
 38 		var max	= -Infinity;
 39 		for(var i = 0; i < currentValues.length; i++){
 40 			max	= Math.max(max, currentValues[i]);
 41 		}
 42 		return max;
 43 	};
 44 	// update the graph
 45 	var updateGraph	= function(value, color){
 46 		// update currentValues
 47 		currentValues.shift();
 48 		currentValues.push(value);
 49 		// handle autoscaling
 50 		var max	= cpuMaxCurrentValues();
 51 		if( max > maxViewableValue ){
 52 			maxViewableValue	= max * 1.2;
 53 			reflowGraph();
 54 		}else if( max < 0.5 * maxViewableValue ){
 55 			maxViewableValue	= max * 1.2;
 56 			reflowGraph();			
 57 		}
 58 		// compute the height
 59 		var normValue	= value / maxViewableValue;
 60 		var height	= Math.min(30, 30 - normValue * 30);		
 61 		// display the height
 62 		var childEl	= graphEl.appendChild( graphEl.firstChild );
 63 		childEl.style.height	= height + 'px';
 64 		// change color if needed
 65 		if( color ) childEl.style.backgroundColor	= color;
 66 	};
 67 	// reflow the graph - used for autoscaling
 68 	var reflowGraph	= function(){
 69 		for(var i = 0; i < currentValues.length; i++){
 70 			var value	= currentValues[i];
 71 			// compute the height
 72 			var normValue	= value / maxViewableValue;
 73 			var height	= Math.min(30, 30 - normValue * 30);		
 74 			// display the height
 75 			var childEl	= graphEl.children[i];
 76 			childEl.style.height	= height + 'px';
 77 		}
 78 	};
 79 
 80 	var gcMonitor	= new GcMonitor();
 81 	var lastTime	= 0;
 82 
 83 	return {
 84 		domElement	: container,
 85 		update		: function(){
 86 			// refresh only 30time per second
 87 			if( Date.now() - lastTime < 1000/60 )	return;
 88 			lastTime	= Date.now()
 89 			// get value and color
 90 			var color	= '#131';
 91 			gcMonitor.check(function(delta, burnRate){
 92 				color	= '#830';
 93 			});	
 94 			var value	= gcMonitor.usedHeapSize();
 95 			// update graph
 96 			updateGraph(value, color);
 97 			// display label
 98 			testEl.textContent = "Mem: " + bytesToSize(value, 2);			
 99 			function bytesToSize( bytes, nFractDigit ){
100 				var sizes = ['B ', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB'];
101 				if (bytes == 0) return 'n/a';
102 				nFractDigit	= nFractDigit !== undefined ? nFractDigit : 0;
103 				var precision	= Math.pow(10, nFractDigit);
104 				var i 		= Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(1024));
105 				return Math.round(bytes*precision / Math.pow(1024, i))/precision + ' ' + sizes[i];
106 			};
107 		}
108 	}
109 };
110 
111 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
112 //										//
113 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
114 
115 /**
116  * display how heavily memory is allocated 
117  * 
118  * heavily based on @mrdoob stats.js
119  */
120 var GcMonitorStatsBurnRate = function (){
121 
122 	var container	= document.createElement( 'div' );
123 	container.style.cssText = 'width:80px;opacity:0.9;cursor:pointer';
124 
125 	var divEl	= document.createElement( 'div' );
126 	divEl.style.cssText	= 'padding:0 0 3px 3px;text-align:left;background-color:#020;';
127 	container.appendChild( divEl );
128 
129 	var textEl	= document.createElement( 'div' );
130 	textEl.innerHTML= 'rate: ';
131 	textEl.style.cssText	= 'color:#0f0;font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:9px;line-height:15px';
132 	divEl.appendChild( textEl );
133 
134 	var graphEl	= document.createElement( 'div' );
135 	graphEl.style.cssText	= 'position:relative;width:74px;height:30px;background-color:#0f0';
136 	divEl.appendChild( graphEl );
137 
138 	var currentValues	= [];
139 	var maxViewableValue	= 2*1024*1024;
140 	for(var i = 0; i < 74; i++){
141 		currentValues[i]	= 0;
142 		var barEl	= document.createElement( 'span' );
143 		barEl.style.cssText	= 'width:1px;height:30px;float:left;background-color:#131';
144 		graphEl.appendChild( barEl );
145 	}
146 
147 	// get max of currentValues - used for autoscaling
148 	var cpuMaxCurrentValues	= function(){
149 		var max	= -Infinity;
150 		for(var i = 0; i < currentValues.length; i++){
151 			max	= Math.max(max, currentValues[i]);
152 		}
153 		return max;
154 	};
155 	// update the graph
156 	var updateGraph	= function(value){
157 		// update currentValues
158 		currentValues.shift();
159 		currentValues.push(value);
160 		// handle autoscaling
161 		var max	= cpuMaxCurrentValues();
162 		if( max > maxViewableValue ){
163 			maxViewableValue	= max * 1.2;
164 			reflowGraph();
165 		}else if( max < 0.5*maxViewableValue ){
166 			maxViewableValue	= max * 1.2;
167 			reflowGraph();			
168 		}
169 		// compute the height
170 		var normValue	= value / maxViewableValue;
171 		var height	= Math.min(30, 30 - normValue * 30);		
172 		// display the height
173 		var childEl	= graphEl.appendChild( graphEl.firstChild );
174 		childEl.style.height	= height + 'px';
175 	};
176 	// reflow the graph - used for autoscaling
177 	var reflowGraph	= function(){
178 		for(var i = 0; i < currentValues.length; i++){
179 			var value	= currentValues[i];
180 			// compute the height
181 			var normValue	= value / maxViewableValue;
182 			var height	= Math.min(30, 30 - normValue * 30);		
183 			// display the height
184 			var childEl	= graphEl.children[i];
185 			childEl.style.height	= height + 'px';
186 		}
187 	};
188 
189 	var gcMonitor	= new GcMonitor().start(function(){}, 1000/60);
190 	var lastTime	= 0;
191 	return {
192 		domElement	: container,
193 		update		: function(){
194 			// refresh only 5time per second
195 			if( Date.now() - lastTime < 1000/5 )	return;
196 			lastTime	= Date.now()
197  			// get current value
198 			var value	= gcMonitor.burnRate();
199 			// update graph
200 			updateGraph(value);
201 			// display label
202 			textEl.textContent = "rate: " + bytesToSize(value, 2);			
203 			function bytesToSize( bytes, nFractDigit ){
204 				var sizes = ['B', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB'];
205 				if (bytes == 0) return 'n/a';
206 				nFractDigit	= nFractDigit !== undefined ? nFractDigit : 0;
207 				var precision	= Math.pow(10, nFractDigit);
208 				var i 		= Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(1024));
209 				return Math.round(bytes*precision / Math.pow(1024, i))/precision + ' ' + sizes[i];
210 			};
211 		}
212 	}
213 };
214 
215 
216 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

218 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
219 
220 /**
221  * vuemeter on gc activity - stats.js like 
222  * - union of GcMonitorStatsCollection/GcMonitorStatsBurnRate
223  */
224 var GcMonitorStats	= function (){
225 	// build domElement container
226 	var container	= document.createElement('div');
227 	// instanciate GcMonitorStatsBurnRate
228 	var statsBurnRate	= new GcMonitorStatsBurnRate();
229 	container.appendChild(statsBurnRate.domElement);
230 	// instanciate GcMonitorStatsCollection
231 	var statsCollection	= new GcMonitorStatsCollection();
232 	container.appendChild(statsCollection.domElement);
233 	// return domElement and update()
234 	return {
235 		domElement	: container,
236 		update		: function(){
237 			statsCollection.update();
238 			statsBurnRate.update();
239 		}
240 	};
241 }
